CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Proposal Sent stage positioned above or below the Lead Captured stage?
SRP.A: The Proposal Sent stage is positioned {below} the Lead Captured stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initial Contact?
VE.A: The value of stage Initial Contact is {637}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Needs Analysis?
VE.A: The value of stage Needs Analysis is {474}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Lead Captured, with a value of {806}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Negotiation, with a value of {190}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Initial Contact to stage Needs Analysis?
SC.A: Decreased by {163} Clients from stage Initial Contact to stage Needs Analysis.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 400? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Lead Captured} stage has {806}, the {Initial Contact} stage has {637}, the {Needs Analysis} stage has {474}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 258? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 258 and 555? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Needs Analysis} stage has {474}, the {Proposal Sent} stage has {327}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Proposal Sent to Negotiation, or from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Needs Analysis} to {Proposal Sent} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent, from stage Initial Contact to Needs Analysis, or from stage Lead Captured to Initial Contact?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Lead Captured} to stage {Initial Contact} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Lead Captured} and {Initial Contact} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Proposal Sent} and {Negotiation} stages.
